languages.text: Для власть предержащих Простора не было секретом, что при жизни Инквизитора ван Калокса и Вольного Торговца фон Валанциус связывал тесный и плодотворный союз. Однако лишь единицам было известно, что природа этих отношений была куда сложнее и ближе, чем политический пакт. Двое возлюбленных, обремененные многочисленными обязанностями, лишь изредка находили время и возможность встретиться среди звезд Простора — однако эти свидания продолжались всю их жизнь.

It was no secret to those who held power in the Expanse that Inquisitor van Calox and Rogue Trader von Valancius had shared a close and fruitful bond. But very few knew that the nature of their relationship was more complicated and intimate than a simple political alliance. The two lovers, burdened by numerous responsibilities, very rarely had the chance to meet among the stars of the Expanse. Yet, they kept up these assignations until the end of their lives.
languages.original_text: Для власть предержащих Простора не было секретом, что при жизни Инквизитора ван Калокса и Вольного Торговца фон Валанциус связывал тесный и плодотворный союз. Однако лишь единицам было известно, что природа этих отношений была куда сложнее и ближе, чем политический пакт. Двое возлюбленных, обремененные многочисленными обязанностями, лишь изредка находили время и возможность встретиться среди звезд Простора — однако эти свидания продолжались всю их жизнь.

traits.locale_text: It was no secret to those who held power in the Expanse, that in life Inquisitor van Calox and Rogue Trader von Valancius shared close and fruitful relations. But very few knew that the nature of their relationship was more complicated and intimate than a simple political alliance. Two lovers burdened by numerous responsibilities had far too few opportunities to meet among the stars of Koronus Expanse. Yet they kept on their encounters until the end of their lives.

languages.text: 对于科罗努斯扩区的掌权者来说，冯·卡洛克斯审判官与冯·瓦兰修斯家族行商浪人之间富有成果的密切合作并不是什么秘密。但很少有人知道，他们的关系本质上远比简单的政治联盟更加复杂、更加亲密。这对爱人肩负着无数的责任，鲜有机会能在科罗努斯的群星间相遇。然而，他们一直保持着彼此的联系，直至生命的尽头。
languages.original_text: It was no secret to those who held power in the Expanse that Inquisitor van Calox and Rogue Trader von Valancius had shared a close and fruitful bond. But very few knew that the nature of their relationship was more complicated and intimate than a simple political alliance. The two lovers, burdened by numerous responsibilities, very rarely had the chance to meet among the stars of the Expanse. Yet, they kept up these assignations until the end of their lives.

traits.locale_text: 对于科罗努斯扩区的掌权者来说，冯·卡洛克斯审判官与冯·瓦兰修斯家族行商浪人之间富有成果的密切合作并不是什么秘密。但很少有人知道，他们的关系本质上远比简单的政治联盟更加复杂、更加亲密。这对爱人肩负着无数的责任，鲜有机会能在科罗努斯的群星间相遇。然而，他们一直保持着彼此的联系，直至生命的尽头。

languages.text: Es war kein Geheimnis für die Machthabenden in der Ausdehnung, dass Inquisitor van Calox und {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin} von Valancius eine enge, fruchtbare Beziehung pflegten. Nur sehr wenige aber wussten, dass das Wesen dieser Beziehung komplizierter und intimer war und über eine einfache politische Allianz hinausging. Ob seiner zahlreichen Pflichten hatte das Liebespaar nur selten Gelegenheit, sich zwischen den Sternen der Ausdehnung zu treffen. Sie hielten die Tradition dieser Treffen aber bis zum Ende ihres Lebens aufrecht.
languages.original_text: It was no secret to those who held power in the Expanse that Inquisitor van Calox and Rogue Trader von Valancius had shared a close and fruitful bond. But very few knew that the nature of their relationship was more complicated and intimate than a simple political alliance. The two lovers, burdened by numerous responsibilities, very rarely had the chance to meet among the stars of the Expanse. Yet, they kept up these assignations until the end of their lives.

traits.locale_text: Es war kein Geheimnis für die Machthabenden in der Ausdehnung, dass Inquisitor van Calox und {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin} von Valancius eine enge, fruchtbare Beziehung pflegten. Nur sehr wenige aber wussten, dass das Wesen dieser Beziehung komplizierter und intimer war und über eine einfache politische Allianz hinausging. Ob seiner zahlreichen Pflichten hatte das Liebespaar nur selten Gelegenheit, sich zwischen den Sternen der Ausdehnung zu treffen. Sie hielten die Tradition dieser Treffen aber bis zum Ende ihre Leben aufrecht.

languages.text: Tous les dirigeants des Étendues savaient que l'inquisiteur van Calox et {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} von Valancius étaient particulièrement proches, mais peu d'entre eux avaient conscience que leurs liens étaient bien plus complexes et plus intimes qu'une simple alliance politique. Les deux amants, accaparés par leurs responsabilités respectives, n'avaient que rarement l'occasion de se croiser au cours de leurs voyages dans les Étendues. Malgré tout, ils préservèrent leur relation jusqu'à la fin de leur vie.
languages.original_text: It was no secret to those who held power in the Expanse that Inquisitor van Calox and Rogue Trader von Valancius had shared a close and fruitful bond. But very few knew that the nature of their relationship was more complicated and intimate than a simple political alliance. The two lovers, burdened by numerous responsibilities, very rarely had the chance to meet among the stars of the Expanse. Yet, they kept up these assignations until the end of their lives.

traits.locale_text: Tous les dirigeants des Étendues savaient que l'inquisiteur van Calox et la libre-marchande von Valancius étaient particulièrement proches, mais peu d'entre eux avaient conscience que leurs liens étaient bien plus complexes et plus intimes qu'une simple alliance politique. Les deux amants, accaparés par leurs responsabilités respectives, n'avaient que rarement l'occasion de se croiser au cours de leurs voyages dans les Étendues. Malgré tout, ils préservèrent leur relation jusqu'à la fin de leur vie.

languages.text: No era ningún secreto para los poderosos de la Extensión que el Inquisidor van Calox y la Comerciante Independiente von Valancius habían tenido relaciones cercanas y fructíferas, pero muy pocos sabían que su relación era mucho más compleja e íntima que una mera alianza política. La pareja, atrapada por sus muchas responsabilidades, rara vez tenía ocasión de encontrarse cara a cara entre las estrellas de la Extensión. No obstante, se mantuvieron en sus respectivos puestos hasta el final de sus vidas.
languages.original_text: It was no secret to those who held power in the Expanse that Inquisitor van Calox and Rogue Trader von Valancius had shared a close and fruitful bond. But very few knew that the nature of their relationship was more complicated and intimate than a simple political alliance. The two lovers, burdened by numerous responsibilities, very rarely had the chance to meet among the stars of the Expanse. Yet, they kept up these assignations until the end of their lives.

traits.locale_text: No era ningún secreto para los poderosos de la Extensión que el Inquisidor van Calox y la Comerciante Independiente von Valancius habían tenido relaciones cercanas y fructíferas, pero muy pocos sabían que su relación era mucho más compleja e íntima que una mera alianza política. La pareja, atrapada por sus muchas responsabilidades, rara vez tenían ocasión de encontrarse cara a cara entre las estrellas de la Extensión. No obstante, siguieron viéndose hasta el final de sus vidas.

languages.text: 異端審問官のヴァン・カロックスと自由開拓者のフォン・ヴァランシウスが緊密かつ実り多い関係を築いてきたことは、エクスパンスで権力を握る者たちにとっては周知の事実だった。しかし二人の関係が単なる政治的な同盟関係よりも複雑で濃密なものであることを知っている者はほとんどいなかった。数多の責任を背負わされていた2人の恋人が、エクスパンスの星々の間で会える機会はほとんどなかった。しかし、ふたりは人生の最後までこのような交際を続けたのだ。
languages.original_text: It was no secret to those who held power in the Expanse that Inquisitor van Calox and Rogue Trader von Valancius had shared a close and fruitful bond. But very few knew that the nature of their relationship was more complicated and intimate than a simple political alliance. The two lovers, burdened by numerous responsibilities, very rarely had the chance to meet among the stars of the Expanse. Yet, they kept up these assignations until the end of their lives.

traits.locale_text: 異端審問官のヴァン・カロックスと自由開拓者のフォン・ヴァランシウスが緊密かつ実り多い関係を築いてきたことは、エクスパンスで権力を握る者たちにとっては周知の事実だった。しかし二人の関係が単なる政治的な同盟関係よりも複雑で濃密なものであることを知っている者はほとんどいなかった。数多の責任を背負わされていた2人の恋人が、エクスパンスの星々の間で会える機会はほとんどなかった。しかし、ふたりは人生の最後までこのような交際を続けたのだ。

languages.text: Enginlik'teki güç sahipleri, Engizisyoncu van Calox ile Hür Tacir von Valancius arasında yakın ve verimli bir bağ olduğunun gayet farkındaydı. Aralarındaki ilişkinin doğasının basit bir politik ittifaktan çok daha komplike ve samimi olduğunu bilenler ise çok daha azdı. Sayısız sorumluluğun yükünü taşıyan iki âşık, Enginlik'teki yıldızlar arasında bir araya gelme şansını fazla bulamasa da bu kaçamaklarını ömürleri boyunca devam ettirdiler.
languages.original_text: It was no secret to those who held power in the Expanse that Inquisitor van Calox and Rogue Trader von Valancius had shared a close and fruitful bond. But very few knew that the nature of their relationship was more complicated and intimate than a simple political alliance. The two lovers, burdened by numerous responsibilities, very rarely had the chance to meet among the stars of the Expanse. Yet, they kept up these assignations until the end of their lives.

traits.locale_text: Engizisyoncu van Calox ve Hür Tacir von Valancius arasında yakın ve verimli bir bağ olduğu, Enginlik'teki güç sahibi kişiler için bir sır değildi. Aralarındaki ilişkinin doğasının basit bir politik ittifaktan çok daha komplike ve daha samimi olduğunu bilenler ise çok daha azdı. Sayısız sorumluluğun yükünü taşıyan iki âşık, Enginlik'in yıldızları arasında bir araya gelme şansını fazla bulamıyorlardı ancak bu kaçamaklarına yaşamlarının sonuna değin devam ettiler.
